summary: A man begins to have disturbing visions of dead people, among whom are his mother and victims of a local serial killer. The detective investigating the murders looks to him for help in solving the case.
cast: Ted Danson|Mary Steenburgen|Diane Ladd|Michael Moriarty|Donna White|Connor Widdows|Joy Coghill|Jay Brazeau|Maggie Blue O'Hara|Queen Latifah|Jack Palance|Reece Thompson|Neil Denis|Mikela Jay|Eric Breker|Lindsay Bourne|Kavan Smith|Hiro Kanagawa|Bill Meilen|John B. Lowe|Henry O. Watson|Veena Sood|David Kaye|James Kirk|Joel Palmer|Ben Johnson|Branden Nadon|Matthew Brevner|Jaren Brandt Bartlett|Bethoe Shirkoff|Michael Eklund|Ben Baxter|Nancy Sivak|Karen Elizabeth Austin|Dee Jay Jackson|Klodyne Rodney|Kwesi Ameyaw|Lorena Gale|Richard Sali|David Petersen|Jessica Schreier|Patti Allan|Norman Armour|Nahanni Arntzen|Simone Bailly|Chilton Crane|Linda Darlow|Jason Gaffney|Fred Henderson|Tim Henry|Lauren Holly|Sadie Lawrence|Don MacKay|David Makay|Larry Musser|John Sampson|James Van Praagh
title: La puerta del más allá
